segments.advisor_message: So, tell me about any savings you have. Who is the owner of them?
segments.client_message: Uh, it's me. I'm the owner of the accounts.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And what type of accounts are we talking about here?
segments.client_message: I have like, um, a savings account and an ISA.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And which provider holds these accounts?
segments.client_message: They're with, uh, NatWest and also one with, um, Halifax.
